meanings.sent1: The prosiest book I ever read put me to sleep within minutes.
meanings.sent2: Her prosiest speeches always made the audience yawn.
meanings.sent3: The prosiest lecture on history made even the most dedicated students doze off.
meanings.sent4: His prosiest writing style was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent5: The prosiest storyteller in town could make a thrilling adventure sound like a boring task.

meanings.definition: Characterized by long-winded or boring speech or writing
meanings.sent1: The prosiest movie I watched seemed to never end.
meanings.sent2: His prosiest emails always took forever to get to the point.
meanings.sent3: The prosiest play in town made the audience wish for an intermission.
meanings.sent4: Her prosiest stories dragged on like a slow-moving turtle.
meanings.sent5: The prosiest speaker at the conference made everyone check their watches repeatedly.
